name: Buy groceries
mission: Go to the supermarket and buy some fruits, vegetables and milk

name: Clean the house
mission: Vacuum the floor, clean the bathroom and wash the dishes

name: Do laundry
mission: Wash and dry the clothes, fold and put them away

name: Pay bills
mission: Check the bills, write checks or transfer money online and file the receipts

name: Study for exam
mission: Review the notes, read the textbook and practice answering questions
